import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid, StylesProvider } from '@material-ui/core'; import styles from './Card.module.css'; import cx from 'classnames'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; const Cards = ({data:{confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate} }) => { if(!confirmed){ return "loging..." } return (
Infected {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of active cases by covid19 Recovered {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of recoveries from covid19 Death {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of Death by covid19
); } export default Cards;
